{"id":996290332,"question_id":445,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1689557646,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/996290332/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"43.3 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {\n        l1 = reverse(l1);\n        l2 = reverse(l2);\n        \n        ListNode dummy = new ListNode();\n        ListNode curr = dummy;\n        \n        \n        int carry =0;\n        while(l1!=null || l2!=null || carry==1){\n            \n            ListNode node = new ListNode();\n            curr.next = node;\n            curr = curr.next;\n            \n            \n            int sum = carry;\n            if(l1!=null){\n                sum+=l1.val;\n                l1=l1.next;\n            }\n            if(l2!=null){\n                sum+=l2.val;\n                l2=l2.next;\n            }\n            \n            curr.val = sum%10;\n            carry = sum/10;\n            \n        }\n        \n        ListNode head = dummy.next;\n        dummy.next = null;\n        \n        \n        return reverse(head);\n    }\n    \n    \n    private ListNode reverse(ListNode l1){\n        \n        ListNode prev=null;\n        ListNode curr =l1;\n        while(curr!=null){\n            ListNode next = curr.next;\n            curr.next = prev;\n            prev = curr;\n            curr = next;\n        }\n        \n        \n        return prev;\n    }\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
